title: Please help identify font. Thanks!
content:
It looks like FF Absara but not all the letters are identical.

Lower-case letters on bottom line look very different, more rounded,especially the “a.”

Any ideas?

see attached image.

Thanks in advance!

s.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615181600im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/vespers_5059.jpg)

 [‹ What font is this?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615181600/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46355 "Go to previous forum topic") [Frutiger & Futura's Love child? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615181600/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46299 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sfreund

comments.content:
Of course it is!

thanks a lot!

you guys are amazing...!
